name: Eureka / Past And Then
summary:
One year after from his acclaimed debut album "Etude", finally Nhato is back with double original tracks "Eureka" and "Past And Then" which shows the true forefront of the electronic music.

Futuristic energy groover "Eureka" is a perfect hybridization of progressive, electo and trance styles. Having constructed with complextro gimmicks and complicated chord progressions, the musical journey provides the allure of the new dimension of the trance.

With the respect for old school rave flavors, "Past And Then" brings contrasts of the decadent synths and cutting-edged electro-dubstep beats. During the breakdown, growling basslines and chopped synths causes a tremendous damage to the dancefloor.
info:
• 制作人: Nhato
  • 厂牌: Otographic Music
  • 版本特性: OTO-024
  • 发售日期: 2013.08.07
  • 录音: Otographic Music
  • 碟片数量: 1
